> I've worked with jCoverage and C=
obertura for the past several months. 
> However, I'd like to find a tool t=
hat will display, for each

s actually

> exactly /h=
ow/ that line was executed. I don't recall whether

ther suggestions? Commercial version of 
> jCoverage?

is? At first, I created a custom Javadoc

d to their class-under-test's 
> method comments, to the tune of:

**

st#testAddThreeBars()

=

he developers.
